metrics_conclusion: Only Happy When It Rains has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Only Happy When It Rains has sections analyzed in the following keys: G♯ Minor,  and C♯ Mixolydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
